LTN101.name: Elementary Latin I
LTN101.description: Fundamentals of vocabulary, grammar, and syntax. Translation of elementary readings.

LTN102.name: Elementary Latin II
LTN102.description: Continued study of the fundamentals of vocabulary, grammar, and syntax. Translation of elementary readings.

LTN206.name: Nepos and Latin Prose
LTN206.description: Selected lives of Cornelius Nepos in the original Latin, with readings in other early and Republican prose authors.

LTN208.name: Catullus and Lucretius
LTN208.description: Readings from Catullus's poems and from Lucretius's "De Rerum Natura" in Latin with additional readings.

LTN211.name: Livy and Roman Historiography
LTN211.description: Selections from Livy's "Ab Ubre Condita" in the original Latin.

LTN221.name: Virgil and Latin Poetry
LTN221.description: Readings from Virgil's "Eclogues", "Georgics", and "Aeneid" in Latin. Additional readings from other Latin poets of the later Republic and Augustan periods.

LTN290.name: Independent Study
LTN290.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
LTN290.description: Special projects arranged by an individual student and a faculty member in areas supplementing regular course offerings.

LTN406.name: Senior Seminar: Tacitus (W)
LTN406.description: Advanced study of the works of Tacitus in the original Latin.
LTN406.prerequisite: Completion of Tier I Writing Requirement

LTN408.name: Senior Seminar: Virgil (W)
LTN408.description: Advanced study of the works of Virgil in the original Latin.
LTN408.prerequisite: Completion of Tier I Writing Requirement

LTN421.name: Senior Seminar: Horace (W)
LTN421.description: Advanced study of the works of Horace in the original Latin.
LTN421.prerequisite: Completion of Tier I Writing Requirement

LTN490.name: Independent Study
LTN490.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
LTN490.description: Special projects arranged by an individual student and a faculty member in areas supplementing regular course offerings.
LTN490.restrictions: Not open to sophomores or freshmen. Approval of department.

LTN499.name: Senior Thesis
LTN499.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
LTN499.description: Senior thesis capstone under the direction of a faculty member.
